dcterms:description: OpenExp is an open-source dataset for experimental procedure prediction, featuring 274,439 pairs of chemical reactions and their corresponding step-by-step instructions of experimental procedures.
dcterms:title: OpenExp

dcterms:creator: C. Edwards

dcterms:description: PubChem324k is a dataset containing 324,000 molecule-text pairs, used for tasks such as molecule captioning and text-based molecular generation.
dcterms:title: PubChem324k

dcterms:creator: D. Lowe
dcterms:description: USPTO-Applications is a dataset containing chemical reactions extracted from US patents, providing a comprehensive source of chemical reaction data.
dcterms:title: USPTO-Applications

dcterms:description: ORD is the Open Reaction Database, which contains a large collection of chemical reactions along with their conditions and experimental procedures.
dcterms:title: ORD
